medical_history.chief_complaint: Poor tooth formation and absence of one of the upper central incisors.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with cerebral malformations observed via ultrasound at 7 months of gestation. The patient has a history of developmental delays and specific conditions diagnosed at 2 years of age. Currently, he is reported to be showing progressive improvement in psychomotor development and language.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Holoprosencephaly, hearing loss requiring a hearing aid, hypernatremia, psychomotor developmental delay, moderate mental retardation. Previous surgeries include cryptorchidism correction at 5 years old.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother had a previous miscarriage at 2 months of gestation. Not specified if any other relevant family history exists.
medical_history.social_history: The patient attends school and has a healthy diet. Not specified regarding smoking, alcohol consumption, or other lifestyle factors.
